segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, her focus entirely on the plate in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the faucet spills over the sink, creating a little waterfall onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's as if she's in her own little bubble, completely unaware of the chaos building around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but worry about the puddle spreading beneath her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem bothered at all, which is both calming and concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how easily the children could slip if they aren't careful.
segments.speaker: PAR
